no cheat sheet anymore

19 January 2010

All the time I used cheat sheet struggling with my bad memory.

  • Rails sheet
  • Postgres sheet
  • Prototype sheet
  • jQuery sheet
  • Girls sheet...

No need anymore!!! Because Cheat Comes.

install
gem install cheat

use
cheat stuff

check all sheets
cheat sheets

need help(cheet?)
cheat cheat

examples
cheat mysql cheat svn cheat ruby cheat console

more information
http://cheat.errtheblog.com
